name: autobiographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is based on or involves the writer's own life: The novelist said that while she doesn't try to write autobiographically, it is inevitable that some elements from her life work their way into her fiction. The filmmaker's most recent film is an autobiographically inspired story about a boy growing up in 1970s Brooklyn.
More examplesFewer examplesSome parts of her speech were autobiographically revealing, such as the fact that she and her twin brother grew up apart and only reunited as adults.
